page.title: 11NESSCLIFFE SCHOOL
page.content: The school is not very big. It has only about 6O children. Some of the children come from abroad and live on the army camp. We only have three classes. Our teachers are called Mrs Brittain, Miss Campbell and Mrs Nugent. The outside of our school is brick, it used to be tiled. In March they put in bricks instead and new windows even though the school is not very old. We have a big field to play football on and a concrete pitch to play netball and football. In the corner is a climbing frame. Before the school was built there was another school on the main road. It is about 22O years old. They stopped using it in l965. It is built of sandstone and had a bell on top which rang for the start of school. Before the school there was a chapel called St Mary's of the Rocks built there.
